tools.title: Salary Not Paid Notice
tools.description: Demand pending salary with Labour Department-ready language (‚âà5 min).
tools.when_to_consult: Consult a lawyer if arrears exceed ‚Çπ50,000 or termination is disputed.
tools.sample_preview: Opening paragraph referencing Shops & Establishments compliance.
sample_highlights: States exact months unpaid and statutory references.
Demands payment within 7 days before escalating to Labour Commissioner.
Mentions right to claim interest and penalties.
tools.sample_example_input: Employee Nisha has not received April & May 2025 salary totaling ‚Çπ1,20,000 despite reminders.
tools.sample_example_output: "This is to demand immediate release of my salary for April and May 2025 amounting to ‚Çπ1,20,000 within seven (7) days, failing which I shall approach the Labour Commissioner."

tools.title: Rent Default / Eviction Notice
tools.description: Remind tenants about arrears and handover timelines.
tools.when_to_consult: Consult a lawyer if the property is mortgaged or eviction may require police aid.
tools.sample_preview: Notice referencing Section 106 Transfer of Property Act.
sample_highlights: Specifies rent due, maintenance, and notice period.
Calls for peaceful possession if dues unpaid.
Warns that municipal dues will be recovered from deposit.
tools.sample_example_input: Tenant owes ‚Çπ45,000 for July-August rent in Bengaluru apartment.
tools.sample_example_output: "You are called upon to clear ‚Çπ45,000 within fifteen (15) days or hand over vacant possession of Flat 203, Green Meadows, failing which eviction proceedings will commence."

tools.title: Consumer Complaint Notice
tools.description: Escalate defective product or poor service disputes.
tools.when_to_consult: Consult a lawyer if the defect caused injury or losses above ‚Çπ2 lakh.
tools.sample_preview: Consumer Protection Act compliant notice format.
sample_highlights: Captures invoice, complaint numbers, and desired remedy.
Allows replacement, repair, or refund choice.
Sets 15 day cure period before District Commission filing.
tools.sample_example_input: Washing machine bought for ‚Çπ28,500 stopped working within 10 days.
tools.sample_example_output: "Kindly replace the unit or refund ‚Çπ28,500 with ‚Çπ3,000 compensation within fifteen (15) days failing which complaint shall be filed before the Consumer Commission."

tools.title: Cheque Bounce Notice
tools.description: Issue NI Act compliant notice within 30 days of dishonour.
tools.when_to_consult: Consult a lawyer if multiple cheques bounced or limitation deadline is near.
tools.sample_preview: Section 138 NI Act format with demand clause.
sample_highlights: Mentions cheque number, date, bank, and return memo reason.
Demands payment within statutory 15 days.
Warns of prosecution and civil recovery.
tools.sample_example_input: Cheque No. 123456 dated 10 Oct 2025 for ‚Çπ2,40,000 returned for insufficient funds.
tools.sample_example_output: "You are hereby called upon to make payment of ‚Çπ2,40,000 within fifteen (15) days of receipt of this notice, failing which complaint under Section 138 shall be filed without further reference."

tools.title: Residential Rent Agreement
tools.description: 11-month lease with deposit, utilities, and exit clauses.
tools.when_to_consult: Consult a lawyer if the property is jointly owned or involves corporate tenants.
tools.sample_preview: Lease summary with rent, deposit, and maintenance table.
sample_highlights: Captures rent schedule and deposit adjustments.
Includes maintenance responsibilities and notice clause.
Adds special clause section for pets or parking.
tools.sample_example_input: Flat 5B rented for ‚Çπ32,000/month with ‚Çπ1.5 lakh deposit.
tools.sample_example_output: "Monthly rent of ‚Çπ32,000 is payable before the 5th of every month; ‚Çπ1,50,000 security deposit shall be refunded within 15 days after adjusting damages."

tools.title: Freelance Services Agreement
tools.description: Document scope, milestones, and IP transfer for gigs.
tools.when_to_consult: Consult a lawyer if IP ownership or licensing is complex.
sample_highlights: Breaks down milestones with fees and due dates.
Clarifies IP transfer on full payment.
Contains confidentiality & termination clause.
tools.sample_example_output: "Milestone 2 (Brand Book delivery) is payable at ‚Çπ35,000 within 7 days of submission; intellectual property transfers upon receipt."

tools.title: Employment Offer Letter
tools.description: Issue formal offers with CTC breakup and joining terms.
tools.when_to_consult: Consult a lawyer if ESOPs, garden leave, or relocation clauses are involved.
tools.sample_preview: Offer letter page with compensation summary.
sample_highlights: CTC breakup table with allowances.
Probation and background verification text.
Includes acceptance block for signatures.
tools.sample_example_input: Senior Product Manager offer ‚Çπ36 LPA starting 2 Dec.
tools.sample_example_output: "Your annual CTC is ‚Çπ36,00,000 comprising fixed salary of ‚Çπ28,00,000 and performance bonus up to ‚Çπ8,00,000. Probation is 6 months from your DOJ 02 Dec 2025."

tools.title: Mutual NDA
tools.description: Share sensitive information securely with partners.
tools.when_to_consult: Consult a lawyer if foreign parties or export controls are involved.
sample_highlights: Defines confidential information.
Sets 3 year survival period.
Includes jurisdiction + injunctive relief clauses.
tools.sample_example_input: Cybersecurity pilot between TechLabs and VendorCo.
tools.sample_example_output: "Each party shall protect confidential information with at least the same degree of care it uses to protect its own confidential information and not less than reasonable care."

tools.title: Sale of Goods Agreement
tools.description: Record B2B supply deals with warranties and delivery terms.
tools.when_to_consult: Consult a lawyer if cross-border shipments or LC payments are involved.
tools.sample_preview: Table covering quantity, price, and delivery window.
sample_highlights: Captures SKU quantities and GST.
Specifies warranty and indemnity text.
Includes liquidated damages clause for late delivery.
tools.sample_example_output: "Buyer shall pay ‚Çπ16,00,000 within 10 days of dispatch; Seller warrants goods for 12 months against manufacturing defects."

tools.title: Notice Period Advisor
tools.description: Estimate statutory notice period using sector + tenure.
tools.when_to_consult: Consult a lawyer if employment is governed by certified standing orders.
tools.sample_preview: Scenario: 3.5 years in IT services recommends 40 days.
sample_highlights: Shows statutory min/cap with explanation.
Flags when company policy exceeds Shops & Establishments guidance.
Provides rationale text for HR emails.
tools.sample_example_output: "Recommended notice is 40 days (statutory base 30 + 5 days/year) capped at 90 days."

tools.title: Working Hours & Overtime
tools.description: Check Factories Act compliance and overtime pay.
tools.when_to_consult: Consult a lawyer if weekly hours regularly exceed 60 or shifts cross midnight.
tools.sample_preview: Scenario: 52 hour week at ‚Çπ350/hr triggers overtime.
sample_highlights: Shows compliant vs warning states.
Calculates overtime hours and estimated pay.
Mentions double rate assumption with citation.
tools.sample_example_output: "Overtime triggered for 4 hours. Estimated overtime pay: ‚Çπ2,800 at 2x."

tools.title: Maternity Benefit Estimator
tools.description: Check eligibility + benefit under the Maternity Benefit Act.
tools.when_to_consult: Consult a lawyer if employer has <10 employees or roles are contractual.
tools.sample_preview: Scenario: 240 days at ‚Çπ1,500/day qualifies for 26 weeks.
sample_highlights: Displays eligibility badge.
Shows payable weeks/days and estimated benefit.
Mentions supporting documents needed.

tools.title: Consumer Compensation Calculator
tools.description: Combine refund, delay damages, and expenses for notices.
tools.when_to_consult: Consult a lawyer if damages exceed ‚Çπ5 lakh or involve medical negligence.
sample_highlights: Breaks down refund vs damages.
Shows recommended demand letter value.
Explains assumptions per Consumer Protection Act.

tools.title: AI Document Reviewer
tools.description: Upload drafts and get instant plain-language risk flags.
tools.when_to_consult: Consult a lawyer if the document will be filed in court or signed by CXOs.
tools.sample_preview: Demonstrates how Saathi summarises clauses and risks.
sample_highlights: Uploads sample vendor agreement and highlights redlines.
Shows summary bullets + next steps.
Explains data retention and manual review options.
tools.sample_example_input: 5 page vendor agreement with indemnity and payment clause.
tools.sample_example_output: "AI Review Flags: (1) Payment milestone mismatch, (2) Overbroad indemnity, (3) Missing jurisdiction clause. Suggested fixes provided."
